[center]The 100 is een Amerikaanse drama serie van The CW. De serie ging in premiÃƒÂ¨re op 19 maart 2014. 

 De serie speelt zich af 97 jaar nadat een nucleaire oorlog de beschaving heeft verwoest. Een ruimteschip dat huisvesting geeft aan de eenzame menselijke overlevenden stuurt 100 jeugddelinquenten terug naar de aarde om te onderzoeken of er een mogelijkheid is tot rekolonisatie. [b]Aflevering 01 Pilot

 [/b]Ninety-seven years ago, nuclear Armageddon decimated planet Earth, destroying civilization. The only survivors were the 400 inhabitants of 12 international space stations that were in orbit at the time. Three generations have been born in space, the survivors now number 4,000, and resources are running out on their dying "Ark." Among the 100 young exiles are Clarke, the bright teenage daughter of the ArkÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s chief medical officer; the daredevil Finn; the brother/sister duo of Bellamy and Octavia, whose illegal sibling status has always led them to flaunt the rules, the lighthearted Jasper and the resourceful Monty. Technologically blind to whatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s happening on the planet below them, the ArkÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s leaders Ã¢â‚¬â€ ClarkeÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s widowed mother, Abby; Chancellor Jaha; and his shadowy second in command, Kane Ã¢â‚¬â€ are faced with difficult decisions about life, death and the continued existence of the human race.[/center]
